member.name: M:VRage.Audio.X3DAudio.X3DAudioExtensions.UpdateValuesOmni(VRage.Audio.X3DAudio.Emitter,VRageMath.Vector3,VRageMath.Vector3,VRage.Data.Audio.MySoundData,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Single})

member.name: T:VRage.Audio.NativeSourceVoice
member.summary: Native wrapper for source voice. It's not ref counted, no need to call Release or Dispose.
